alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 03 at 3:24AM MDT until April 06 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Cody Foothills, North Big Horn Basin, Southwest Big Horn Basin, Southeast Big Horn Basin and Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated blowover risk, especially for light and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Also high winds could do some light roof damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin
